wikipedia_page.main: Cleopatra Madonna Higgins, better known as Cleo, is a British R&B/soul/pop singer, dancer, songwriter and actress based in Manchester, England. Higgins was the lead singer of the eponymously named sister act, Cleopatra.

response: Later in 2010, Trenyce joined the Michael Jackson tribute concert revue Thriller – Live as the leading female vocalist during a European tour. She reprised her role when the show played at the Lyric Theatre in London's West End. She starred in the concert for three years, from 2010 until 2013, performing material from different periods in Jackson's career. In an interview with The Hollywood Reporter, Trenyce said that the audience was initially hesitant to hear a woman interpret Jackson's music. Theatreworld's Geoff Billingsley praised Trenyce's performance, writing that her voice sounded very similar to Jackson's and describing her as an improvement over the previous female lead Cleo Higgins.
Cleo Higgins appeared as a contestant on season 2 of The Voice UK, exiting the show at the semi finals.
* Cleo Higgins (born Cleopatra Madonna Higgins, 30 April 1982, Birmingham) – lead vocals
* Cleo Higgins (born 1982), of the vocal group Cleopatra

The album was largely written by lead singer Cleo Higgins, who had written some of the songs while as young as 9 years old. It was recorded in 1997 when Cleo was only 14 years old. When the original demos were recorded they were R&B and soul records which were later remixed into pop songs. Cleo often wrote about personal experiences or issues she felt she needed to address. On the track "A Touch of Love", Cleo goes into her whistle register, hitting F#6.

"U Got It" is a 2000 single by U.K. girl-group Cleopatra, the second single from their second album, Steppin' Out. It was written and produced by Stargate and Cleo Higgins and was the only single from the album to be released as a single in the United States.

The most recent production, in 2017, celebrated the show's 30th anniversary at the Hippodrome Casino, London. The cast included: Ian Carlyle as The Man, Enyonam Gbesemete as The Lady, Cleo Higgins as The Woman and Bleu Woodward as The Girl."Blues in the Night – London Hippodrome", Musical Theatre Review, June 7, 2017.
Cleo Higgins served was the main songwriter on the album, which was also co-written by her bandmates. As well the album features production from Jimmy Jam and Terry Lewis, Dallas Austin and Stargate.
